entry.title: Bitcoin Core and hard forks
entry.summary: The Bitcoin mailing list is a low-volume community for technical proposals and discussion regarding Bitcoin. Personal attacks or bullying are not tolerated on this platform. The archive for 2012 can be referred to as an example. It is emphasized that this list is not intended to be a pillory for personal issues, nor a place to exhibit personal hobby horses. The activities of individuals on Twitter or other platforms are not relevant in this context.
